column2: ENGLISH
De Jure Claim on [Title.GetBaseName]
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$-$SECOND_ADJ$ De Jure War over $OTHER_TITLE$
The §Y$TITLE$§! is, de jure, a vassal of §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§!, which is cause enough for war.
column3: Le §Y$TITLE$§! est, de Jure, un vassal de §Y$CLAIMANT$§!, ce qui constitue un motif de guerre suffisant.
column4: §Y$TITLE$§! Ist ein de jure-Vasall von §Y$CLAIMANT$§! - Grund genug für einen Krieg.
column6: El §Y$TITLE$§! es, de iure, vasallo de §Y$CLAIMANT$§!, lo cual es motivo suficiente de guerra.

column2: Subjugation
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ War to Subjugate $SECOND$
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! may attempt to force §Y$TARGET$§!, a de jure vassal, to swear fealty.
Unification Claim on [Title.GetBaseName]
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$-$SECOND_ADJ$ Holy Roman Unification War over $OTHER_TITLE$
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! may attempt to usurp §Y$TITLE$§!, a kingdom of the Carolingien Empire, from §Y$TARGET$§!.
De Jure Claim on [Title.GetBaseName]
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$-$SECOND_ADJ$ De Jure War over $OTHER_TITLE$
The §Y$TITLE$§! is, de jure, a vassal of §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§!, which is cause enough for war. This casus belli is only available to the founder of the Empire.
column3: Le §Y$TITLE$§! est, de Jure, un vassal de §Y$CLAIMANT$§!, ce qui constitue un motif de guerre suffisant.
column4: §Y$TITLE$§! Ist ein de jure-Vasall von §Y$CLAIMANT$§! - Grund genug für einen Krieg.
column6: El §Y$TITLE$§! es, de iure, vasallo de §Y$CLAIMANT$§!, lo cual es motivo suficiente de guerra.

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes all occupied territory.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes or vassalizes all titles in the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! belonging to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
The occupying forces disband, settle the territory, and refill the local levies.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes all occupied territory.\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes the new §Y[This.GetRulerTitle] of [This.GetBaseName]§!.\n
Has not pledged peace to [This.GetHerHis] vassals.\n
You must be overlord of a crown title with at least §GMedium Crown Authority§! that applies to §Y[From.GetBestName]§!\n
You must be overlord of a crown title with at least §GHigh Crown Authority§! that applies to §Y[From.GetBestName]§!\n
Does NOT have a prior cooldown in effect for the Holy Roman Unification CB\n
Has de jure territory neighboring or close to the de facto realm of §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!.\n
Primary title is one of the Carolingien kingdoms, and it has at least §GMedium Crown Authority§!\n
Does NOT have a weak claim that could be pressed right now\n
Religion is not Catholic or, if the Fraticelli Papacy exists, Fraticelli\n
Culture is not appropriate for unification of the Carolingien Empire\n
Has ruled at least 2 of the Carolingien kingdoms for 10 years each\n
